page.title: 22Stanmore Park - ex RAF
page.content:
RAF Stanmore Park was opened in 1939 and closed in 1997. The site was developed with relatively high density housing: a mix of flats and houses, privately owned and social. Some RAF housing is still there, but empty and due for demolition.

Stanmore Park has a Children's Centre and Community Centre with a nursery school and Air Cadets - 2236 (Stanmore) Squadron.

The southern edge of the site bordering Temple Mill Pond has been landscaped with pedestrian and cycle paths and a small playground.
Contribution by: Susan Bell
